newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 22. [corrected 14:00 gmt]
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 22. [corrected 14:00 gmt]

text.p: * Microsoft Corp reported fiscal first quarter earnings per share of $0.95, up from $0.78 a year ago and above the First Call consensus estimate of $0.90. The news came after the stock market close on Monday. Microsoft shares, which closed at 134, rose as high as 136-3/8 in after-hours trading before finishing at 134-3/4.
* Bristol-Myers Squibb Co is expected to report third quarter earnings of $1.48 a share, compared with $1.36 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 104-1/8.
* Digital Equipment Corp reported a first quarter loss per share of $0.48, compared to a profit of $0.26 last year. The First Call estimate was for a loss of $0.14. The stock closed at 34-3/8.
* U.S. Surgical Corp is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.35, up from $0.25 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 45-1/8.
* Salomon Inc reported third quarter earnings per diluted share of $0.85, down from $2.10 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $1.19. The stock closed at 48-5/8.

* Knight-Ridder Inc reported third quarter earnings per share of $1.31, compared to $0.07 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.37. The company said its third quarter included a gain of $0.94 per share from the sale of its financial service. The stock closed at 37-5/8.
* Times Mirror Co is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.36, up from $0.21 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 45-1/8.
* Washington Post Co is expected to report third quarter net of $4.68 per share, compared to $3.79 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 334-1/4.
* Home Shopping Network Inc reported a third quarter profit of $0.07 per share, compared to a loss of $0.20 a year ago. The First Call estimate was for a profit of $0.02. The stock closed at 9-3/4.
* Kimberly Clark is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $1.21, compared to $1.06 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 87-5/8.
* Avon Products Inc is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.46, compared to $0.41 (corrects from $0.47) a year ago. The stock closed at 50-1/4.
* Dial Corp is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.13, compared to $0.45 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 13-1/2.
* Newell Co reported third quarter earnings per share of $0.47, compared to $0.41 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.48.
* Playtex Products Inc is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.10, compared to $0.11 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 8-3/4.
